pixi.renderers.webgl.utils.FilterTexture

type
class
metadata
:native
"PIXI.FilterTexture"

Constructor

new(gl : Dynamic, width : Float, height : Float, ?scaleMode : Float)
parameters
gl {WebGLContext} the current WebGL drawing context
width {Number} the horizontal range of the filter
height {Number} the vertical range of the filter
scaleMode {Number} Should be one of the PIXI.scaleMode consts

Instance Variables

frameBuffer : Dynamic

gl : Dynamic

scaleMode : Float

texture : Dynamic

Instance Methods

clear() : Void

Clears the filter texture

destroy() : Void

Destroys the filter texture

resize(width : Float, height : Float) : Void

parameters
width {Number} the new width of the texture
height {Number} the new height of the texture
Resizes the texture to the specified width and height
